item.title: R: Replacing NAs in all factors with 'Missing'
item.description: With a simple combination of mutate_if and fct_explicit_na,you can replace all NAs in all factors with “Missing”: dplyr reference: http://dplyr.tidyverse.org/reference forcats reference: http://dplyr.tidyverse.org/reference
